content:
© 2024 Accordion     CONFIDENTIAL
Power BI reporting project
1
Built a reporting suite on Power BI for Accounting & Finance domain that included 
Revenue, Accounts Receivables, Billings, Commissions & Accounting functions
Healthcare out-of-network solutions company

© 2024 Accordion     CONFIDENTIAL
Picture this…
You’re looking to set up the new reporting suite on Power BI for Accounting & Finance domains that includes Revenue, 
Accounts Receivables, Billings, Commissions & Accounting functions to have a better visibility into the company’s  
performance.
Healthcare out-of-network solutions company needs “better 
coverage” of its financial performance
2
Your value is enhanced. 
•
You have consistent and standard KPIs captured across different reports/business functions and an automated BI reporting 
process with access to nearly real time data
•
You have better visibility into the financial performance of the company and its reporting, based on cleansed and validated data
•
You also have a central data access management to enable easy distribution of reports across the company
ACCOUNTING AND FINANCIAL 
REPORTING
KEY RESULT   
•
Impact 1…
•
Impact 2…
VALUE LEVERS PULLED
•
Automated ETL 
processes
•
Data cubes and ready-
to-serve data marts 
•
Power BI based 
financial dashboard
2
You turn to Accordion. 
We partner with your team to streamline the BI reporting suite to provide more visibility into the financial  performance, including:
1)
Analyzing the accounting system (Quick Books Online) and billing system (Invoices and payments data) to identify the relevant 
KPIs and cleanse the data
2) Building automated ETL processes to load the accounting data daily from QuickBooks in the integrated database using API 
connection
3) Developing data cubes on the integrated database and creating ready-to-serve data marts for analytical and reporting purposes
4) Developing automated Power BI dashboards on top of these data cubes to analyze the financial performance
5) Incorporating automated data validation and reconciliation rules at every ETL step across the entire process to ensure accuracy 
and consistency in data

© 2024 Accordion     CONFIDENTIAL
Accordion Value Add 
•
Analyzed the Accounting system (Quick Books Online) and Billing system (Invoices and payments data) to identify the relevant KPIs and cleanse the data
•
Built automated ETL processes to load the accounting data daily from QuickBooks in the integrated database using API connection
•
Developed data cubes on the integrated database and created ready-to-serve data marts for analytical and reporting purposes
•
Developed automated Power BI dashboards on top of these data cubes to analyze the performance of the company performance
•
Incorporated automated data validation and reconciliation rules at every ETL step across the entire process to ensure accuracy and consistency in data
Situation
•
Client had an opportunity to streamline their BI reporting suite to provide more visibility into the company’s  performance
•
Partnered with the client to set up the new reporting suite on Power BI for their Accounting & Finance domains that includes Revenue, Accounts 
Receivables, Billings, Commissions & Accounting functions
Business intelligence infrastructure design and implementation
3
Impact
•
Consistent and standard KPIs across different reports/business functions and automated BI reporting process with access to latest data until the previous 
day
•
Improved visibility in the financial performance of the company and reporting based on cleansed and validated data
•
Implemented central data access management and enabled easy distribution of reports across the company
Power BI reporting project

© 2024 Accordion     CONFIDENTIAL
4
Prior reporting processes
Data Sources
Reporting Layer
SQL Database
Excel downloads from 
QuickBooks Online
Manual cleansing & 
harmonization of data
Business Reports
•
Invoice report
•
AR reports
•
Payments reports
•
Commissions 
report
Data Structures
Financial reports
•
Balance Sheet
•
P&L reports
Observations on prior reporting plan:-
▪
File processing was I/O intensive operation and slowed the 
performance of the system. Also, possibility of files being 
corrupted in transmitting
▪
Creating Financial reports was very cumbersome as raw data 
from QuickBooks online needed to be transformed to develop the 
required Financial reports
▪
Management of data accesses was cumbersome and time 
consuming to provision new accesses
Data, Reporting 
and Analytics
▪Lack of consistency of data sources across different reports
▪Lack of consistency and documentation on KPIs, formulae
▪Prone to errors as the data is manually updated 
▪Lack of availability of real-time data

© 2024 Accordion     CONFIDENTIAL
5
New BI infrastructure implemented
Revenue Summary
Accounting system
Transactional data
Data Sources
Data ingest and synthesis
Data visualizations
Data Views
Integrated Database 
Invoices
Budget/Forecast
Payments
Accounting
Budget/Forecast data
Automated 
ETL process
Automated 
ETL process
Customer Economics
Accounting Summary
Account Receivables
▪Built automated ETL process to load accounting data from QuickBooks in the Integrated database using their API connection and configured e-mail alerts/notifications to monitor 
the overall ETL process
▪Transformed the transaction data and developed ready-to-serve data marts for analytical and reporting purposes. Developed Power BI dashboards on top of these data views 
to monitor and track the business performance
▪Incorporated automated data validation and reconciliation rules at every ETL step across the entire process to ensure accuracy and consistency in data

© 2024 Accordion     CONFIDENTIAL
